title: OpenType Resources (link collection)
content:
Hello all, here is an updated version of my link collection dedicated to OpenType font production (and type design):  
 [http://www.kltf.de/kltf\_otresources.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016082840/http:/www.kltf.de/kltf_otresources.htm)  
You may bookmark this link -- I'll try not to change it.

Corrections are always welcome.

Best wishes,  
Karsten
author: k.l.

comments.content: Karsten, I've been learning alot from your great tutorials and resources, not to mention all the questions answered here on the forum. Many thanks for sharing your knowledge to the world! :)

Hey, that's really cool!  
Thanks, Karsten!

karsten,  
i think you sent me some of this information while i was in the middle of Underground and i never got around to thanking you. i still need to do so properly, but thanks for sharing your knowledge and experience with the rest of us!
